thread.title: Main suspect arrested in video of gun flashed near police
thread.title_full: Main suspect arrested in video of gun flashed near police

author: wtopstaff
title: Main suspect arrested in video of gun flashed near police
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Music » Main suspect arrested in… Main suspect arrested in video of gun flashed near police By AMANDA LEE MYERS October 7, 2015 8:37 pm 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — A primary suspect has been arrested in connection with an online video that shows someone flash a gun while filming a Los Angeles police officer in what later turned out to be a publicity stunt. 
LAPD Officer Matthew Ludwig says the man was arrested Wednesday, but he had no other details, including the suspect’s name. 
Though police at first thought the video was a threat, an investigation later revealed it was made by a 1990s rap group looking to ignite a comeback. 
Police learned of the video last week and believe it was taken in early September. 
The attorney for two LAPD officers who shot and killed a man on Saturday tells The Los Angeles Times that the lawmen thought they were under attack because of the video. Topics:
